cf.lukasheinzl.util

Class Reflection

  • java.lang.Object
    • cf.lukasheinzl.util.Reflection

  • public class Reflection
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to modify/get values of fields and methods using Reflection. This is a little wrapper over Java's Reflection API.
    Author:
    Lukas Heinzl

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.reflect.Method getMethod(java.lang.Class<?> where, java.lang.String what, java.lang.Class<?>... types)
      Used to get the method of a class using Reflection.
      static java.lang.Object getValue(java.lang.Class<?> where, java.lang.String what, java.lang.Object on)
      Used to get the value of a field using Reflection.
      static void mutate(java.lang.Class<?> where, java.lang.String what, java.lang.Object on, java.lang.Object newValue)
      Used to modify the value of a field using Reflection.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • mutate

        public static void mutate(java.lang.Class<?> where,
                          java.lang.String what,
                          java.lang.Object on,
                          java.lang.Object newValue)
                   throws ReflectionException
        Used to modify the value of a field using Reflection.
        Parameters:
        where - The class where the field is located in
        what - The name of the field
        on - The object for an instance field or null for class fields
        newValue - The value to be set
        Throws:
        ReflectionException - If the field is not found or could not be accessed
        See Also:
        NoSuchFieldException, IllegalAccessException

      • getValue

        public static java.lang.Object getValue(java.lang.Class<?> where,
                                        java.lang.String what,
                                        java.lang.Object on)
                                 throws ReflectionException
        Used to get the value of a field using Reflection.
        Parameters:
        where - The class the field is located in
        what - The name of the field
        on - The object for an instance field or null for class fields
        Returns:
        The value of the given field
        Throws:
        ReflectionException - If the field is not found or could not be accessed
        See Also:
        NoSuchFieldException, IllegalAccessException

      • getMethod

        public static java.lang.reflect.Method getMethod(java.lang.Class<?> where,
                                                 java.lang.String what,
                                                 java.lang.Class<?>... types)
                                          throws ReflectionException
        Used to get the method of a class using Reflection.
        Parameters:
        where - The class the method is located in
        what - The name of the method
        types - An array of Class<?> containing the types of the methods parameters
        Returns:
        The method
        Throws:
        ReflectionException - If the method could not be found or accessed
        See Also:
        NoSuchMethodException, SecurityException
